info.name: truchet avoidance
info.description:
example of truchet avoiding collisions with the green dot.
( switch comments lines 10/11 for a truchet changing over time ).

renderpass.code:
#define S(v) smoothstep( 9./R.y, 0., v )                            // AAÂ draw

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         V = 5.* u / R.y, U = V + iTime,
         I = floor(U),                                              // Cell id
         F = fract(U)-.5;                                           // cell local coords
         
    if (    fract(1e4*sin(dot(I,R-17.))) < .5                       // random swap some cells
 // if (    fract(1e4*sin(dot(I+floor(iTime),R-17.))) < .5          // variant: change all the time
         || I == vec2(floor(2.5+iTime)) )                           // swap if dot is passing here
         F = vec2(-F.y,F);
    
    O = vec4( S( abs( min(length(F-.5),length(F+.5)) - .5 ) -.1 ) );// draw truchet
    
    O.g += S(length(V-2.5)-.1);                                     // draw green dot
    
}
